title: Jeff Brazier removes his wedding ring amid marriage problems with wife Kate Dwyer
text:
He recently admitted to having marital problems with wife Kate Dwyer.

And, Jeff Brazier was seen without his wedding band on his left hand, in a video uploaded to the Vanarama Twitter page last Tuesday (October 22nd).

The presenter, 40, and his wife are apparently working through their issues after it was revealed that they had decided to unfollow each other on Instagram.

No ring! Jeff Brazier, 40m was seen without his wedding band on his left hand, in a video uploaded to the Vanarama Twitter page last Tuesday (October 22nd)

Jeff, who is father to Bobby, 16, and Freddie, 15, from his relationship with the late Jade Goody, was spotted without his ring while discussing his sporting predictions for the brand.

With his hands front and centre during his Twitter presentation, the absence of his wedding band was clear.

MailOnline has contacted Jeff Brazier's representatives for comment.

This notable absence of his wedding ring comes after his spokesman confirmed he and wife Kate - who he wed last year - had been having marital problems.

Happier times: The presenter recently admitted that he and wife Kate are having marital problems (Picture together in November 2018)

Gone: With his hands front and centre during his sports predictions presentation on Twitter, the absence of his wedding band was clear

Sad news: Worried fans noticed they had 'unfollowed' each other on Instagram

The Sun reported that worried fans had noticed that the couple, who tied the knot last year, had unfollowed one another on social media.

A spokesperson for TV presenter Jeff told MailOnline at the time, that the couple are still together, despite any problems they might be facing.

He said: 'There is categorically no split between Jeff and Kate. We're slightly bewildered how the story has come about.

'However, they have had some difficulties but they are doing their utmost to work through them together and will continue to do so in private.'

The couple have not been pictured together since August, when Jeff shared pictures of them on a trip to Manchester with his sons Bobby and Freddie.

A spokesperson MailOnline: 'There is categorically no split. However, they have had some difficulties but they are doing their utmost to work through them together'

Troubles: The couple recently unfollowed one another on social media

The boys are from Jeff's romance with Jade Goody, who sadly passed away from cancer ten years ago, when she was just aged 27.

Jeff and Kate tied the knot in a romantic Portuguese cliff-top wedding ceremony in September last year.

They announced their engagement in October 2017, with the TV star revealing he had sweetly asked the approval of his sons with late reality TV star Jade Goody.

Speaking to HELLO! magazine, ahead of the wedding, Jeff gushed: 'I couldn't be happier. This isn't just any wedding, this is a really special one.'

Jeff proposed to his girlfriend of five years in Ibiza, after seeking permission from his children in October 2017.

Bond: Kate is very close to Bobby and Freddie who clearly love her very much

Jeff revealed: 'I told her I loved her, and had been thinking about this for a while. I pulled the box with the ring out from my back pocket and asked if she would marry me. It was a very special moment.'

Last June, Jeff told MailOnline that Kate was a wonderful stepmother to his boys.

He said: 'Kate has adjusted very well now to becoming a step mum and what it entails.

'And the sacrifices that have to be made in order to give the children what they need first and for most.

'We spend some lovely family time together as the four of us. I personally love it when Kate does things with the boys when I'm not around.'
